original_title: B-24: Bombers Over Normandy: The Victory Bombers
overview: Take to the skies as Allied forces use air power to change the course of World War II. The B-24 bomber was among the greatest weapons in the U.S. arsenal, and it was used to devastating effect in the Normandy campaign. Rarely seen archival military footage takes viewers into the B-24 cockpit and into the heart of the decisive battle that brought an end to the war.
title: B-24: Bombers Over Normandy: The Victory Bombers
